attributes.additional_details: I would like to see all grandparent  and absent present  get legal aid  to help them see there child or grandchild  . This is wrong that the government stopped all legal help
attributes.background: I don't get to see my grandchild and I really want them in my life  and I want to take them to court but can't afford to do so . Please sign and help others who have the same trouble

rejection.details: You could start a petition calling on the Government to provide legal aid to any grandparent or absent parent who needs to go to court to help them to see their child or grandchild.
